s_synopsis: "Street Fighter - The Movie" is a 2D versus fighting game based on the movie of the same name, which in turn is based on the well known Capcom series, "Street Fighter". Gameplay is similar to "Street Fighter II" and "Super Street Fighter II Turbo". Select from a range of fighters (including Ryu, Ken, Guile, M. Bison and Chun Li) each with their own set of special moves, and defeat all of the opposition to become the King of street fighting.
